title: Testing absolute URLS Before The Website is Live
body:
Is there a way to test absolute urls before a site is live? (probably a stupid question, but gotta learn somewhere)

For example, website is called http://www.newwebsite.com

Building the site with links coded like <li><a href="http://www.newwebsite.com/page1/">Page 1</a></li>

Is there anyway of testing the links all work, without the site actually being live?

Thanks
